item.title: MIUI OS2.0.101.0.VNLRUXM Recovery update for POCO X6 Pro 5G Russia
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: POCO X6 Pro 5G Russia

Codename: duchamp

Version: OS2.0.101.0.VNLRUXM | 15.0

Size: 5.6 GB

MD5: 0c568f7fd0e207e99149453325f3181b

Changelog:
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
New: When quickly opening and closing apps, multiple app animations are displayed simultaneously
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.101.0.VNLTWXM Fastboot update for POCO X6 Pro 5G Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO X6 Pro 5G Taiwan

Codename: duchamp

Version: OS2.0.101.0.VNLTWXM | 15.0

Size: 7.5 GB

MD5: 797baca8875a1ef6756584ae95999d10

Changelog:
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
New: When quickly opening and closing apps, multiple app animations are displayed simultaneously
[System]
New: Support for one-tap clipboard clearing
[Floating windows]
New: Beautify for video feature entry prompt in the call toolbox
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Lock screen]
New: Scenery templates
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases
[Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi]
Your smart personal assistant
· New visuals with multiple ways to activate the assistant anytime you need it.
Multimodal interaction: Perceive the world around you with your camera and easily recognize objects that appear on your screen.
· Improved search: Supports natural language searches for photos, videos, documents, notes, and recordings.
Smart scenes: Seamlessly integrates system features, letting you perform complex tasks with a single step. This feature also learns your patterns to offer helpful services proactively.

Download: Here
